title: Insights into the molecular interactions between urease subunit gamma from MRSA and drugs: an integrative approach by STD-NMR and molecular docking studies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30859-30872
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01732C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Anum Fatima, M. Iqbal Choudhary, Shezaib Siddiqui, Humaira Zafar, Kaifeng Hu, Atia-tul Wahab
This study identified 15 FDA-approved drugs that interact with the urease subunit gamma of MRSA 252, potentially inhibiting its activity and offering new avenues for MRSA treatment.
